RestoreBalanceTimeout.Hint: Enter custom number (in seconds). Default timeout value is 15 seconds.

SilveryBarbsTimeout.Hint: Enter custom number (in seconds). Default timeout value is 30 seconds.
SilveryBarbsTimeout.Name: Silvery Barbs Timeout

TaleOfHubrisTimeout.Hint: Enter custom number (in seconds). Default timeout value is 15 seconds.
TaleOfHubrisTimeout.Name: Tale of Hubris Timeout

TemporalShuntTimeout.Hint: Enter custom number (in seconds). Default timeout value is 15 seconds.
TemporalShuntTimeout.Name: Temporal Shunt Timeout

WitchesHexTimeout.Hint: Enter custom number (in seconds). Default timeout value is 30 seconds.
WitchesHexTimeout.Name: Witches Hex Timeout

DebugEnabled.Hint: If enabled, this will output console logs for the reaction validation process for troubleshooting.
DebugEnabled.Name: Enable Debug

Enable3prNoCombat.Hint: If enabled, this will allow 3rd party reactions to function while combat is not active.
Enable3prNoCombat.Name: Enable 3rd Party Reactions Outside Combat

EnableTimerFullAnim.Hint: If enabled, this will cause the countdown timer animation for dialogs to cover the full title bar instead of the title bar border.
EnableTimerFullAnim.Name: Enable Timer Full Bar Animation

HideTemplates.Hint: This option is always enabled for Opportunity Attacks. If this setting is enabled, it will fully hide templates for other automations that use templates in my module. It will NOT hide templates for automations or templates created outside of my module.
HideTemplates.Name: Hide Templates

ChronalShift.Description: Dialog for Chronurgy Wizards' Chronal Shift.
ChronalShift.Name: Chronal Shift

CuttingWords.Description: Dialog for College of Lore Bards' Cutting Words.
CuttingWords.Name: Cutting Words

DisableCuttingWordsMaxMiss.Description: Skip prompt if max bardic die wouldn't effect hit.
DisableCuttingWordsMaxMiss.Name: Disable Cutting Words Max Miss

EnableProtectionOnSuccess.Description: Only trigger on a successful attack.
EnableProtectionOnSuccess.Name: Enable Protection On Success

FlashOfGenius.Description: Dialog for Artificers Flash of Genius.
FlashOfGenius.Name: Flash of Genius

InstinctiveCharm.Description: Dialog for Enchantment Wizards' Instinctive Charm.
InstinctiveCharm.Name: Instinctive Charm

PoetryInMisery.Description: Dialog for College of Tragedy Bards'.
PoetryInMisery.Name: Poetry in Misery

Riposte.Description: Dialog for Battle Master Fighters' Riposte.
Riposte.Name: Riposte

TaleOfHubris.Description: Dialog for College of Tragedy Bards'.
TaleOfHubris.Name: Tale of Hubris

WitchesHex.Description: Dialog for Roiling Hearth Witches' Hex.
WitchesHex.Name: Witches Hex

OpportunityAttack.Description: Automatically enables Opportunity Attacks for combatants in combat.
OpportunityAttack.Name: Opportunity Attack

Sentinel.Description: Presents a dialog to players with the Sentinel feat when an enemy attacks an ally within range.
Sentinel.Name: Sentinel

MageSlayer.Description: Presents a dialog to players with the Mage Slayer feat.
MageSlayer.Name: Mage Slayer

LegendaryResistance.Description: Presents a dialog for monsters Legendary Resistance feature.
LegendaryResistance.Name: Legendary Resistance

Counterspell.Description: Presents a dialog to players with Counterspell.
Counterspell.Name: Counterspell

SilveryBarbs.Description: Presents a dialog to players with Silvery Barbs.
SilveryBarbs.Name: Silvery Barbs

CounterspellSpellPenetration.Description: Enable optional Bloodied & Bruised feature Spell Penetration.
CounterspellSpellPenetration.Name: Spell Penetration

DisableSilveryBarbsOnNat20.Description: Disable on a Critical Attack Roll.
DisableSilveryBarbsOnNat20.Name: Disable on Critical

EnableSilveryBarbsOnNat20.Description: Enable only on a Critical Attack Roll.
EnableSilveryBarbsOnNat20.Name: Enable on Critical

PowerWordRebound.Description: Presents a dialog to players with Power Word Rebound.
PowerWordRebound.Name: Power Word Rebound

TemporalShunt.Description: Presents a dialog to players with Temporal Shunt.
TemporalShunt.Name: Temporal Shunt

BurstOfIngenuity.Description: Presents a dialog for monsters with Burst of Ingenuity.
BurstOfIngenuity.Name: Burst of Ingenuity

DreadCounterspell.Name: Dread Counterspell
DreadCounterspell.Description: Presents a dialog for Vecna's Dread Counterspell.

Enable3prNoCombat.Description: Allows 3rd party reactions to function while combat is not active.
Enable3prNoCombat.Name: Enable 3rd Party Reactions Outside Combat

EnableIdentifyRestrictions.Description: Prevents players from Identifying items except through the use of my Identify spell.
EnableIdentifyRestrictions.Name: Enable Identify Restrictions

IdentifyRestrictionMessage.Description: Custom message that will display to users if they are restricted.
IdentifyRestrictionMessage.Name: Identify Restriction Message

EnableRegionWrapping.Description: Replaces Foundry default region behavior testing token center points only with multi-point tests to better match the 5e ruleset (Requires Reload).
EnableRegionWrapping.Name: Enable Region Wrapping

EnableTimerFullAnim.Description: Modify the countdown timer animation for dialogs to cover the full title bar instead of the title bar border.
EnableTimerFullAnim.Name: Enable Timer Full Bar Animation

TokenMovementSpeed.Description: Numeric value for token movement animation speed. Default Foundry speed is 6.
TokenMovementSpeed.Name: Token Movement Speed

DebugEnabled.Description: Enable console logs for the reaction validation process for troubleshooting.
DebugEnabled.Name: Enable Debugging

MirrorThirdPartyDialogForGMs.Name: Mirror 3rd Party Dialog for GMs
MirrorThirdPartyDialogForGMs.Description: If enabled, 3rd party dialog's will be sent to the GM as well as the player. Either party can interact with the dialog to use/dismiss/pause it.

UI.InvalidInputNotNumberExample: Invalid input for Numeric Setting Example: Not a number.
